alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 27 at 3:32AM EDT until April 27 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures 27 to 32 degrees. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures 28 to 32 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams
